body.p: This article continues a tradition at Journal of Management Inquiry (JMI) where we get to “look behind the curtain” of a very strong leader. Agyamang’s (2011) article examined how one National Football League player understands his position as a successful African American sports role model. Kaipa and Kriger (2010) examined Alan Mulally’s view of leadership drawing on his experiences as CEO of Boeing and Ford Motor Corporation. In this “Meet the Person,” Wright and Wefald interview Jon Wefald, the former president of Kansas State University. This interview examines how one person puts theoretical concepts of leadership into practice, connecting to recent work in JMI on implicit leadership theories (Schyns & Schilling, 2011). I found this article very interesting in that the questions really allowed Wefald to reflect not only on his career as president but also on his leadership approach. I hope you find this “Meet the Person” interview as interesting as I did.
